Affliction.name: Calyxanide
Affliction.description: The patient is under the strong effects of calyxanide.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of calyxanide poisoning.

Affliction.name: Lead Poisoning
Affliction.description: Patient is under the effects of acute lead poisoning.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of acute lead poisoning.

Affliction.name: Shock
Affliction.description: They are unresponsive and their organs are cannot function due to caused by a lack of oxygen going into their organs .

Affliction.name: High
Affliction.description: They don't seem to be making sense and clearly are on some type of drug.

Affliction.name: Blitivis
Affliction.description: The patient feels severly ill tired and in sever pain, drugs and alcohol abuse could occur.

Affliction.name: Clostridium botulinum
Affliction.description: The patient is suffering from food poisoning caused by Clostridium botulinum.

Affliction.name: Toxin Resistance
Affliction.description: Toxins be gone.

Affliction.name: Oxygen Deprivating Toxins
Affliction.description: Toxins caused by Clostridium botulinum. Antibiotics can worsen the release of these toxins.

Affliction.name: Bacillus Cereus
Affliction.description: The patient is suffering from food poisoning caused by Bacillus CereusEYE.

Affliction.name: Masochism Floriant
Affliction.description: The patient feels compelled to commit self harm, it is suggested to allow the patient to do this as a way of fighting of this bacterial infection until antibiotics have been found.

Affliction.name: Pain
Affliction.description: There's a feeling of pain in this part of the body. The pain has also caused blood preasure to be increased which can increase bleeding.

Affliction.name: Nausea
Affliction.description: The skin is clammy and the patient is vomiting periodically.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have choked on your own vomit.

Affliction.name: Headache
Affliction.description: A headache caused by illness patient feels that their head is aching..

Affliction.name: Fever
Affliction.description: The patient has got a fever.

Affliction.name: Tryposlugs
Affliction.description: The area has clustered holes caused by an infestation of parasites that quickly reproduce at an alarming rate under the skin.
Affliction.causeofdeathdescription: Bloodloss caused by unknown parasitical creature
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to a tryposlug infestation.

Affliction.name: Brain Slug
Affliction.description: There is clear signs of the prescense of a brainslug. Perception is inverted and the feeling of pain is decreased.

Affliction.name: Tryposlug Infestation
Affliction.description: An infestation of parasites that quickly reproduce at an alarming rate under the skin.

Affliction.name: Anesthesia
Affliction.description: The patient is under the effects of anesthesia. Can be lethal in high quantities.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of an anesthesia overdose.

Affliction.name: Sedative
Affliction.description: The patient is under the effects of a sedative. Can be lethal in high quantities.

AfflictionHusk.name: Husk infection
AfflictionHusk.description: Something dark and unpleasant moves in the mouth. They are rendered completely mute, save for occasional clicking sounds apparently emanating from deep within the throat.
AfflictionHusk.causeofdeathdescription: Taken over by a husk parasite
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been taken over by the husk parasite.

Bloodloss.name: Bloodloss
Bloodloss.description: The patient is pale and cold. Their heart beats in an alarmingly rapid fashion.

InternalDamage.name: Internal Damage
InternalDamage.description: The area is an ugly shade of purple. A broken bone impairs movement and enough damage can be lethal.
InternalDamage.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to your internal injuries.

InternalDamage.name: Bite wounds
InternalDamage.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been mauled to death.

InternalDamage.name: Gunshot wound
InternalDamage.description: The entry site is a small, dark, bruised hole oozing a little blood. The exit wound however is a large ragged mess of exposed tissue and pouring blood.
InternalDamage.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of gunshot wounds.

Burn.name: Burn
Burn.description: The area is blistered and red, and skin is already beginning to peel away in sheets. The patient is in a great deal of pain.

Affliction.name: Sulphuric Acid
Affliction.description: The patient's insides are burning, causing a great amount of pain and damage.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to sulfuric acid poisoning.

Affliction.name: Cardiac Arrest
Affliction.description: The patient is suffering from a heart attack caused by bloodclotting, cpr and clotting agents are necessary for their survival.

Affliction.name: Confusion
Affliction.description: The patient is confused and dazed

Affliction.name: Hypoxia
Affliction.description: The tissue in their skin needs oxygen.

Affliction.name: Myocardial ischemia
Affliction.description: The bloodflow to the patients heart has been blocked, this can cause a heart attack if it gets bad enough.

Affliction.name: Blood Clot
Affliction.description: Blood has clotted inside of one of the veins or arteries.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died due to a bloodclot.

OxygenLow.name: Oxygen low
OxygenLow.description: The skin is pale and clammy, and the lips turning blue.

Affliction.name: Cyanide poisoning
Affliction.description: The patient is confused and has trouble breathing. Their skin is red and they have occasional muscle spasms.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of cyanide poisoning.
